id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for this [LD2410 Sensor component if you need multiple components.

*See also: [ld2410 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#configuration-variables)*

throttle.docs:
**int**: Time in milliseconds to control the rate of data updates. Defaults to `1000ms`.

*See also: [ld2410 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#configuration-variables)*

uart_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [UART Component](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#uart) if you want to use multiple UART buses.

*See also: [ld2410 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#configuration-variables)*

ld2410_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for the [LD2410 Sensor component if you are using multiple components.

*See also: [ld2410 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-sensors)*

moving_distance.docs:
**int**: Distance in cm of detected moving target. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [ld2410 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-sensors)*

still_distance.docs:
**int**: Distance in cm of detected still target. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [ld2410 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-sensors)*

moving_energy.docs:
**int**: Energy for moving target. Value between `0` and `100` inclusive. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [ld2410 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-sensors)*

still_energy.docs:
**int**: Energy for still target. Value between `0` and `100` inclusive. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [ld2410 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-sensors)*

light.docs:
**int**: When in [engineering mode](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-engineering-mode), indicates the light sensitivity, otherwise `unknown`. Value between `0` and `255` inclusive. Though it seems that the value `85` is the lowest value at complete darkness. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [ld2410 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-sensors)*

detection_distance.docs:
**int**: Distance in cm of target. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [ld2410 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-sensors)*

ld2410_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for the [LD2410 Sensor component if you are using multiple components.

*See also: [ld2410 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#id1)*

has_target.docs:
If true target detect either still or in movement. All options from [Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/index.html#config-binary-sensor).

*See also: [ld2410 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#id1)*

has_moving_target.docs:
If true a moving target is detected. All options from [Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/index.html#config-binary-sensor).

*See also: [ld2410 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#id1)*

has_still_target.docs:
If true a still target is detected. All options from [Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/index.html#config-binary-sensor).

*See also: [ld2410 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#id1)*

out_pin_presence_status.docs:
When in [engineering mode](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-engineering-mode), indicates whether the OUT pin indicates presence or not, otherwise `false`. OUT pin indication depends on the [light function](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-light-function) configuration. Might need latest firmware to work. All options from [Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/index.html#config-binary-sensor).

*See also: [ld2410 Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#id1)*

ld2410_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for the [LD2410 Sensor component if you are using multiple components.

*See also: [ld2410 Button](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#id5)*

factory_reset.docs:
This command is used to restore all configuration values to their original values. All options from [Button](https://esphome.io/components/button/index.html#config-button).

*See also: [ld2410 Button](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#id5)*

restart.docs:
Restart the device. All options from [Button](https://esphome.io/components/button/index.html#config-button).

*See also: [ld2410 Button](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#id5)*

query_params.docs:
Refresh all sensors values of the device. All options from [Button](https://esphome.io/components/button/index.html#config-button).

*See also: [ld2410 Button](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#id5)*

ld2410_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for the [LD2410 Sensor component if you are using multiple components.

*See also: [ld2410 Number](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-light-threshold)*

timeout.docs:
**int**: Time in seconds during which presence state will stay present after leaving. Defaults to `5s` All options from [Number](https://esphome.io/components/number/index.html#config-number).

*See also: [ld2410 Number](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-light-threshold)*

max_move_distance_gate.docs:
**int**: Maximum distance gate for movement detection. Value between `2` and `8` inclusive. Defaults to `8`. All options from [Number](https://esphome.io/components/number/index.html#config-number).

*See also: [ld2410 Number](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-light-threshold)*

max_still_distance_gate.docs:
**int**: Maximum distance gate for still detection. Value between `2` and `8` inclusive. Defaults to `8`. All options from [Number](https://esphome.io/components/number/index.html#config-number).

*See also: [ld2410 Number](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-light-threshold)*

light_threshold.docs:
**int**: Sets the light threshold for the [light function](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-light-function). Value between `0` and `255` inclusive. Defaults to `128`. All options from [Number](https://esphome.io/components/number/index.html#config-number).

*See also: [ld2410 Number](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-light-threshold)*

ld2410_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for the [LD2410 Sensor component if you are using multiple components.

*See also: [ld2410 Select](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-light-function)*

distance_resolution.docs:
Control the gates distance resolution. Can be `0.75m` or `0.2m`. Defaults to `0.75m`. All options from [Select](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#config-select).

*See also: [ld2410 Select](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-light-function)*

light_function.docs:
If set, will affect the OUT pin value, based on [light threshold](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-light-threshold). Can be `off`, `low` or `above`. Defaults to `off`. All options from [Select](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#config-select).

*See also: [ld2410 Select](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-light-function)*

out_pin_level.docs:
Control OUT pin `away` value. Can be `low` or `high`. Defaults to `low`. All options from [Select](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#config-select).

*See also: [ld2410 Select](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-light-function)*

baud_rate.docs:
Control the serial port baud rate. Defaults to `256000`. Once changed, all sensors will stop working until a fresh install with an updated [UART Component](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#uart) configuration. All options from [Select](https://esphome.io/components/select/index.html#config-select).

*See also: [ld2410 Select](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-light-function)*

ld2410_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for the [LD2410 Sensor component if you are using multiple components.

*See also: [ld2410 Switch](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-engineering-mode)*

engineering_mode.docs:
enable/disable engineering mode. Defaults to `false`. Notice this requires more resources and is not recommended to be enabled when not necessary. All options from [Switch](https://esphome.io/components/switch/index.html#config-switch).

*See also: [ld2410 Switch](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-engineering-mode)*

bluetooth.docs:
Turn on/off the bluetooth adapter. Defaults to `true`. All options from [Switch](https://esphome.io/components/switch/index.html#config-switch).

*See also: [ld2410 Switch](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#ld2410-engineering-mode)*

ld2410_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID for the [LD2410 Sensor component if you are using multiple components.

*See also: [ld2410 Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#id6)*

version.docs:
The firmware version. All options from [Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/index.html#config-text-sensor).

*See also: [ld2410 Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#id6)*

mac_address.docs:
The bluetooth mac address. Will be set to `unknown` when bluetooth is off. All options from [Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/text_sensor/index.html#config-text-sensor).

*See also: [ld2410 Text Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ld2410.html#id6)*
